description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=2/3, Mature Content=0/3. Enter a contest in which two teams of mermaids compete to find a randomly placed coral ball and carry it all the way to the opposing team’s court, within a sunken ship that makes the game a true 3D maze. Can you swim fast enough to win this tournament?
description.short: Enter a contest in which two teams of mermaids compete to find a randomly placed coral ball and carry it all the way to the opposing team’s court, within a sunken ship that makes the game a true 3D maze. Can you swim fast enough to win this tournament?
